segments.text: Very good . I feel quite refreshed now ! You should come with me sometime - exercise is good for you !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: To be honest , I ’ d rather watch television ! Where did you go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just ran alongside the main road .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh you ought to go to the park next time . They have a route for joggers there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh ok , I ’ ll try that tomorrow . It ’ ll probably be better than fighting with the traffic ! Go on , why don ’ t you come along ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh ok then , I ’ ll come and watch you !
segments.speaker: S1
